metadata.name: Chocolate Eggs
metadata.description:
Wrapped chocolate sold in supermarkets teach us at an early age to associate plastic packaging and instant gratification. 

Demand for pure lines and defect-free objects is so high that the physical world canâ€™t satisfy us anymore. Everything must look as spotless as on computer generated images, products must be packaged and protected from reality so that no imperfection can ruin our experience. 

This GIF is from the [Plastic and Virtual Packaging](https://bruchansky.name/2022/01/18/plastic-and-virtual-packaging/) virtual reality art piece (January 2022).
